description:
Leopold Schumacher was an Imperial military officer who sided with the http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt League] during the Imperial Civil War. He was later involved in a Phezzani-conceived plot to abduct Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch225 [Erwin Josef II] and establish a http://anidb.net/ch6226 ["legitimate" Imperial government-in-exile] on Heinessen.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Leopold Schumacher
